Question:

Question:
Iqiniso lokuthi imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ye-deuterium chloride (DCl) ishintshwa kuleyo ye-hydrogen chloride (HCl) kungenxa yomehluko wabo

B.dipole mzuzu
C.amandla njalo
D.mass encishisiwe
GivenAnswer:
impendulo efanele yilena: d. mass encishisiwe

lapho sibheka izinto ezifana ne-deuterium chloride (dcl) ne-hydrogen chloride (hcl), umehluko omkhulu othinta imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared uvela emasini encishisiwe yalezi zinhlanganisela. i-deuterium inesisindo esiphindwe kabili kunaleso se-hydrogen, okusho ukuthi i-dcl izoba nesisindo esincishisiwe esikhulu uma iqhathaniswa ne-hcl. lokhu kushintsha imvamisa yokumuncwa kwe-infrared ngoba imvamisa yokudlidliza kwamabhondi phakathi kwe-athomu ye-hydrogen noma i-deuterium ne-chlorine incike kumthamo wokunyakaza, okuncike kumass encishisiwe. ngakho-ke, i-dcl izoba nemvamisa ephansi yokumuncwa uma iqhathaniswa ne-hcl ngenxa yomass wayo omkhulu encishisiwe.

Question:
Ukusebenza kahle kwe-quantum ye-photon detector ngu-0.1. Uma ama-photons angu-100 ethunyelwa ku-detector, enye ngemuva kwenye, umtshina uzothola ama-photons
A.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-4
B.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3
C.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-1
D.isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-0.1
GivenAnswer:
ukubala ukuthi umtshina uzothola ama-photons amangaki, kudingeka sisebenzise ulwazi lokuthi ukusebenza kahle kwe-detector (efficiency) kungu-0.1. lokhu kusho ukuthi kunamathuba angu-10% okuthi i-photon ngayinye izotholwa yi-detector.

uma kuthunyelwa ama-photons angu-100, silindele ukuthi ama-photons angu-10 azotholwa, ngoba \(0.1 \times 100 = 10\). lokhu kuyisilinganiso (mean) sezikhathi lapho ama-photons azotholwa.

ukubala ukuphambuka okujwayelekile (standard deviation), kudingeka sisebenzise ifomula yokuphambuka okujwayelekile kwe-binomial distribution, okuyi \(\sqrt{np(1-p)}\), lapho \(n\) isibalo sezilingo (ama-photons athunyelwe) no- \(p\) ukusebenza kahle kwe-detector.

ngakho-ke, ukuphambuka okujwayelekile kuzoba:
\[
\sqrt{100 \times 0.1 \times (1 - 0.1)} = \sqrt{100 \times 0.1 \times 0.9} = \sqrt{9} = 3
\]

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yile:
b. isilinganiso sezikhathi ezingu-10, ngokuphambuka kwe-rms cishe kwe-3

Question:

Question:

B.Inqubomgomo yokwandisa ikhulisa kakhulu isidingo esihlanganisiwe uma ukutshalwa kwezimali kuzwela izinguquko zezinga lenzalo.

lokhu kungenxa yokuthi inqubomgomo yokwandisa imali (expansionary monetary policy) ivame ukufaka phakathi ukwehliswa kwezinga lenzalo, okwenza kube shibhile ukuboleka imali. lokhu kungakhuthaza izinkampani nabantu ngabanye ukuthi batshale imali emisebenzini emisha nasekuthengeni izimpahla nezinsizakalo, okwandisa isidingo esihlanganisiwe emnothweni. uma ukutshalwa kwezimali kuzwela kakhulu izinguquko zezinga lenzalo, lokhu kungaba nomthelela omkhulu ekukhuliseni umnotho.

lezi ezinye izitatimende azilungile ngokuphelele noma zidinga ulwazi olwengeziwe ukuze ziqondwe ngokugcwele:

c. inqubomgomo yokunciphisa (contractionary monetary policy) ivame ukusetshenziselwa ukunciphisa ukukhula komnotho okweqile noma ukulawula ukwenyuka kwamanani, hhayi ukukhuthaza ukutshalwa kwezimali.

Question:
Thola ubude be-curve y = ln x phakathi kwamaphuzu lapho y = 1/2 no-y = 1.
A.0.53
B.0.86
C.1.18
D.1.36
GivenAnswer:
ukuze sithole ubude be-curve \( y = \ln x \) phakathi kwamaphuzu lapho \( y = \frac{1}{2} \) no- \( y = 1 \), sidinga ukusebenzisa ifomula yokubala ubude be-arc yomugqa ojwayelekile \( y = f(x) \) phakathi kwezikhathi \( x = a \) no- \( x = b \):

\[
s = \int_a^b \sqrt{1 + \left(\frac{dy}{dx}\right)^2} \, dx
\]

lapha, \( y = \ln x \), ngakho-ke \( \frac{dy}{dx} = \frac{1}{x} \). lokhu kusho ukuthi:

\[
\left(\frac{dy}{dx}\right)^2 = \left(\frac{1}{x}\right)^2 = \frac{1}{x^2}
\]

ngakho-ke, ifomula yokubala ubude be-arc iba:

\[
s = \int_a^b \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]

manje, sidinga ukuthola amanani ka- \( a \) no- \( b \) ngokusekelwe kumagugu ka- \( y \). sazi ukuthi:

\[
y = \frac{1}{2} \quad \text{no} \quad y = 1
\]

lokhu kusho ukuthi:

\[
\ln a = \frac{1}{2} \quad \text{no} \quad \ln b = 1
\]

ngakho-ke:

\[
a = e^{\frac{1}{2}} = \sqrt{e} \quad \text{no} \quad b = e^1 = e
\]

manje sibeka lokhu kufomula yethu yokubala ubude be-arc:

\[
s = \int_{\sqrt{e}}^e \sqrt{1 + \frac{1}{x^2}} \, dx
\]

lokhu kungaxazululwa ngokusebenzisa i-integral calculus. ngokusebenzisa i-calculator noma i-software yokubala, singathola ukuthi:

\[
s \approx 0.86
\]

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yile:

b. 0.86

Question:

ukuguqulwa buthule, noma "silent mutations," kubhekisela ezimweni lapho ushintsho oluthile kwi-nucleotide lungashintshi i-amino acid ekhiqizwayo ngenxa yokuthi ikhodi ye-genetic inokuguquguquka. lokhu kusho ukuthi izinhlobo ezahlukene zingaba nokulandelana kwe-nucleotide okuhlukile kodwa zikhiqize amaprotheni ane-amino acid efanayo. ngakho-ke, ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kungabonisa ubudlelwano obuseduze phakathi kwezinhlobo ngisho noma ukulandelana kwe-nucleotide kungase kubonise umehluko omkhulu. lokhu kwenza ukulandelana kwe-amino acid kube yindlela enokwethenjelwa kakhulu yokunquma ubuhlobo bokuziphendukela kwemvelo phakathi kwezinhlobo ezahlukene uma kuqhathaniswa nokulandelana kwe-nucleotide.

Question:
Ukuguqulwa okubangela i-achondroplasia kusebenza umphumela ongahlukaniswa ngokuthi:
A.okubi okubusayo.
B.inzuzo-of-umsebenzi.
C.haploinsufficiency.
D.ukulahlekelwa-of-umsebenzi.
GivenAnswer:
i-achondroplasia, okuyisifo esivame kakhulu sokukhubazeka kokukhula kwamathambo, ibangelwa ukuguqulwa kwe-genetic ku-fgfr3 gene (fibroblast growth factor receptor 3). lolu guquko luvame ukuba yinguquko ye-point mutation eshintsha i-amino acid ngendlela ethile ku-protein. lokhu kuguqulwa kubangela ukuthi i-fgfr3 protein ibe nesimo esisebenza ngokweqile, okungukuthi, isebenza kakhulu kunokujwayelekile.

Question:
Ithangi lisesimweni se-prism engunxantathu. Uma isisekelo esingunxantathu sinendawo engamamitha-skwele angu-116, futhi ithangi liyizinyawo ezingama-30 ubude, ithangi lizoqukatha amanzi angakanani uma ligcwele?
A.1725 ft^3
B.1740 ft^3
C.3480 ft^3
D.6960 ft^3
GivenAnswer:
ukuze sithole ukuthi ithangi lizoqukatha amanzi angakanani uma ligcwele, sidinga ukubala ivolumu yale prism engunxantathu. ivolumu yale prism ingatholakala ngokusebenzisa ifomula:

\[ \text{volume} = \text{area of base} \times \text{height} \]

lapha, indawo yesisekelo esingunxantathu inikezwe njengamamitha-skwele angu-116, kodwa ubude bethangi bunikezwe ngezinyawo ezingama-30. okokuqala, sidinga ukuguqula indawo yesisekelo ibe yizinyawo-skwele ngoba ivolumu kufanele ibalwe ngamayunithi afanayo.

sazi ukuthi:
\[ 1 \text{ meter} = 3.28084 \text{ feet} \]
\[ 1 \text{ meter}^2 = (3.28084 \text{ feet})^2 = 10.7639 \text{ feet}^2 \]

ngakho-ke, indawo yesisekelo engamamitha-skwele angu-116 izoba:
\[ 116 \text{ m}^2 \times 10.7639 \text{ ft}^2/\text{m}^2 = 1248.6124 \text{ ft}^2 \]

manje sesingabala ivolumu yethangi:
\[ \text{volume} = 1248.6124 \text{ ft}^2 \times 30 \text{ ft} = 37458.372 \text{ ft}^3 \]

kodwa-ke, izinketho ezinikeziwe zonke ziphansi kakhulu uma kuqhathaniswa nesibalo esitholakele. lokhu kungase kube ngenxa yokuthi indawo yesisekelo ibingafanele iguqulwe ibe yizinyawo-skwele, mhlawumbe bekufanele ibalwe ngqo ngezinyawo-skwele. uma sibheka izinketho ezinikeziwe, kungenzeka ukuthi indawo yesisekelo ibingama-116 ft^2, hhayi ama-116 m^2. uma kunjalo, ivolumu izoba:
\[ \text{volume} = 116 \text{ ft}^2 \times 30 \text{ ft} = 3480 \text{ ft}^3 \]

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kulezi zinketho ezinikeziwe kungaba:
c. 3480 ft^3

Question:
Isitatimende 1 | Eqenjini (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}. Isitatimende 2 | Eqenjini (ab)^n = a^nb^n.
A.Yiqiniso, Yiqiniso
B.Amanga, Amanga
C.Yiqiniso, Amanga
D.Amanga, Yiqiniso
GivenAnswer:
ukuhlaziya lezi zitatimende, kufanele sicabangele izakhiwo zamaqembu kanye nemithetho yokuphindaphinda kumaqembu.

isitatimende 1: (ab)^{-2} = b^{-2}a^{-2}

ukubala (ab)^{-2}, singasebenzisa umthetho wokuguqula:
(ab)^{-2} = (ab)^{-1}(ab)^{-1} = (b^{-1}a^{-1})(b^{-1}a^{-1}) = b^{-1}(a^{-1}b^{-1})a^{-1}

uma iqembu liyiqembu elijwayelekile (abelian), lapho zonke izinto ziqhutshwa ngokushintshana (i.e., ab = ba), khona-ke:
a^{-1}b^{-1} = b^{-1}a^{-1}
futhi ngaleyo ndlela:
(ab)^{-2} = b^{-1}b^{-1}a^{-1}a^{-1} = b^{-2}a^{-2}

kodwa-ke, uma iqembu lingelona elijwayelekile, lesi sitatimende singase singabi yiqiniso. ngakho-ke, isitatimende 1 siyiqiniso kuphela uma iqembu liyiqembu elijwayelekile.

isitatimende 2: (ab)^n = a^nb^n

lesi sitatimende siphinde sisebenze kuphela uma iqembu liyiqembu elijwayelekile. uma iqembu lingelona elijwayelekile, khona-ke (ab)^n ≠ a^nb^n ngokuvamile. isibonelo, cabanga ngeqembu lezinguquko zesikhala, lapho ukulandelana kokusebenza kungashintshi ngokujwayelekile.

ngakho-ke, kokubili isitatimende 1 nesitatimende 2 ziyiqiniso kuphela emaqenjini ajwayelekile. uma singazi ukuthi iqembu elibhekiswe kulo liyiqembu elijwayelekile noma cha, asikwazi ukusho ngokuqinisekile ukuthi lezi zitatimende ziyiqiniso ngaso sonke isikhathi.

impendulo efanele ngokwale mibuzo ingaba:
c. yiqiniso, amanga

lokhu kusho ukuthi isitatimende 1 siyiqiniso uma iqembu liyiqembu elijwayelekile, kanti isitatimende 2 singamanga ngaphandle uma iqembu liyiqembu elijwayelekile.

Question:
Chonga i-antecedent yesiphakamiso esilandelayo esinemibandela: I-Bees inqoba umdlalo wayo wokuqala kuphela uma noma i-Aardvarks noma i-Chipmunks ingawinanga imidlalo yayo yokuqala.
A.Ama-Aardvarks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala.
B.Izinyosi zinqoba umdlalo wazo wokuqala.
C.AmaChipmunks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala.
D.Kungenzeka ukuthi ama-Aardvarks noma amaChipmunks awanqobi imidlalo yawo yokuqala.
GivenAnswer:
isiphakamiso esinemibandela esithi "i-bees inqoba umdlalo wayo wokuqala kuphela uma noma i-aardvarks noma i-chipmunks ingawinanga imidlalo yayo yokuqala" singachazwa ngale ndlela elandelayo: 

ukunqoba kwe-bees (b) kuncike ekutheni okungenani elinye lamaqembu, aardvarks (a) noma chipmunks (c), linganqobi. lokhu kungabhalwa ngokwezibalo njenge: b → ¬a ∨ ¬c. lapha, "→" kumele "kuphela uma," kanti "¬" kumele ukuphikiswa (okusho ukuthi "akunqobi").

uma sibheka izinketho ezinikeziwe, sifuna ukuthola i-antecedent yalesi siphakamiso, okuyingxenye yesitatimende esenza isimo sokunqoba kwe-bees sibe yiqiniso. i-antecedent yalesi siphakamiso yi-¬a ∨ ¬c, okusho ukuthi "ama-aardvarks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala noma ama-chipmunks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala."

manje, ake sihlaziye izinketho ezinikeziwe:
a. ama-aardvarks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala.
b. izinyosi zinqoba umdlalo wazo wokuqala.
c. amachipmunks awanqobi umdlalo wawo wokuqala.
d. kungenzeka ukuthi ama-aardvarks noma amachipmunks awanqobi imidlalo yawo yokuqala.

inketho d ("kungenzeka ukuthi ama-aardvarks noma amachipmunks awanqobi imidlalo yawo yokuqala") ihambisana kahle ne-antecedent yalesi siphakamiso, ngoba ichaza ukuthi kungenzeka ukuthi okungenani elinye lamaqembu linganqobi, okuyilokho okudingekayo ukuze i-bees inqobe ngokwesiphakamiso. ngakho-ke, inketho d iyona efanele njenge-antecedent yesiphakamiso esinikeziwe.

Question:
Intela ebekwe kumphakeli cishe izodluliselwa kumthengi ngendlela yokwenyuka kwentengo uma
A.intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.
B.ukuqina kwentengo yokufunwa kuyi-inelastic kakhulu.
C.intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto iyunithi nokunwebeka.
D.umholo nokunwebeka kwesidingo kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.
GivenAnswer:
ukuze siqonde ukuthi intela izodluliselwa kanjani kumthengi, kubalulekile ukubheka ukunwebeka kwesidingo kanye nokunikezwa kwemikhiqizo ethile. ukunwebeka kubhekisa ekutheni abathengi bayashintsha kangakanani ekuthengeni kwabo uma intengo yento ishintsha.

ake sihlaziye izinketho ezinikeziwe:

a. **intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.**
   - uma isidingo sinokunwebeka okukhulu, kusho ukuthi abathengi bayakwazi ukushintsha kalula kwezinye izinketho uma intengo yomkhiqizo inyuka. lokhu kusho ukuthi uma intela ibekwa kumphakeli, akunakwenzeka ukuthi adlulisele intela enkulu kumthengi ngoba abathengi bangavele bayeke ukuthenga umkhiqizo noma bathenge omunye umkhiqizo esikhundleni salo.

b. **ukuqina kwentengo yokufunwa kuyi-inelastic kakhulu.**
   - uma isidingo siyi-inelastic, kusho ukuthi abathengi ngeke bashintshe kakhulu ukuthenga kwabo ngisho noma intengo yomkhiqizo inyuka. lokhu kusho ukuthi uma intela ibekwa kumphakeli, umphakeli angakwazi ukudlulisela intela enkulu kumthengi ngoba abathengi bazothenga umkhiqizo ngentengo ephezulu.

c. **intengo nokunwebeka funa kuyinto iyunithi nokunwebeka.**
   - uma isidingo sinokunwebeka kweyunithi, kusho ukuthi ukushintsha kwentengo kuzohambisana nokushintsha okufanayo kwevolumu yokuthengwa. lokhu kusho ukuthi uma intela ibekwa, umphakeli angase adlulisele ingxenye yentela kumthengi, kodwa hhayi yonke intela.

d. **umholo nokunwebeka kwesidingo kuyinto nokunwebeka kakhulu.**
   - lokhu kubhekisa ekutheni ukuthenga kwabathengi kuyashintsha kanjani uma umholo wabo ushintsha, hhayi uma intengo yomkhiqizo ishintsha. ngakho-ke, lokhu akunikezi ulwazi oluqondile mayelana nokuthi intela izodluliselwa kanjani kumthengi uma ibekwa kumphakeli.

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kule mibuzo ukuthi intela cishe izodluliselwa kumthengi ngendlela yokwenyuka kwentengo uma **b.ukuqina kwentengo yokufunwa kuyi-inelastic kakhulu.** lokhu kusho ukuthi abathengi bazokhokha intengo ephezulu ngoba abanakho ukukhetha okuningi kokunye abangakuthenga esikhundleni salokho.

Question:
Nquma ukuhlushwa kwe-H + (aq) ku-1.0 M phenol, C6H5OH, isixazululo. (I-Ka ye-phenol yi-1 × 10 ^ -10.)
A.1 × 10^-10 M
B.1 × 10^-9 M
C.1 × 10^-3 M
D.1 × 10^-5 M
GivenAnswer:
ukuze sithole ukuhlushwa kwe-h+ (aq) ku-1.0 m phenol solution, sidinga ukusebenzisa ifomula ye-ionization constant (ka) ye-phenol. i-ka isetshenziselwa ukubala ukuhlushwa kwe-hydrogen ions (h+) okukhiqizwa lapho i-phenol ionizinga emanzini.

ifomula ye-ka yile:
\[ ka = \frac{[h^+][a^-]}{[ha]} \]
lapho:
- \( ka \) iyona ionization constant.
- \( [h^+] \) ukuhlushwa kwe-hydrogen ions.
- \( [a^-] \) ukuhlushwa kwe-phenoxide ion (c6h5o^-).
- \( [ha] \) ukuhlushwa kwe-phenol engaguquki.

ngoba i-phenol ibuthakathaka kakhulu, singasebenzisa ukuthi \( [h^+] \approx [a^-] \) futhi \( [ha] \approx \) ukuhlushwa kokuqala kwe-phenol, okuyi-1.0 m.

sibeka lokhu ku-ka formula:
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = \frac{[h^+][h^+]}{1.0} \]
\[ 1 \times 10^{-10} = [h^+]^2 \]

manje sithola \( [h^+] \) ngokukhipha isikwele sempande:
\[ [h^+] = \sqrt{1 \times 10^{-10}} \]
\[ [h^+] = 1 \times 10^{-5} \text{ m} \]

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele yile:
d. 1 × 10^-5 m

Question:
Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okungakhiqiza kakhulu ukukhula komnotho okunamandla ngokuhamba kwesikhathi?
A.Ukusetshenziswa okusheshayo okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo.
B.Amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala.
C.Isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali.
D.Izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali.
GivenAnswer:
d. izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali.

izikweletu zentela yokutshala izimali zingakhuthaza ukutshalwa kwezimali emabhizinisini nasemikhakheni ehlukahlukene yomnotho, okungaholela ekukhuleni komnotho okuqinile ngokuhamba kwesikhathi. lokhu kungenxa yokuthi izikweletu zentela zinganciphisa izindleko zokutshala izimali futhi zikhuthaze abatshalizimali ukuthi batshale imali emikhakheni efana nobuchwepheshe, imfundo, kanye nezempilo, okungaholela ekudaleni imisebenzi, ekuthuthukiseni ubuchwepheshe, nasekukhuleni komnotho jikelele.

a. ukusetshenziswa okusheshayo okuningi kwemithombo yemvelo kungaholela ekukhuleni komnotho okwesikhashana, kodwa akusimeme ngokwemvelo futhi kungadala ukucekelwa phansi kwemvelo okungaholela ezinkingeni zesikhathi eside.

b. amazinga aphezulu okungafundi kwabantu abadala angavimbela ukukhula komnotho ngoba kunciphisa amakhono abantu okuthola imisebenzi ephezulu, okunciphisa umkhiqizo jikelele womnotho.

c. isitoko esiwayo sezimpahla zemali singabonisa ukungazinzi emnothweni, okungaholela ekutshaleni kwezimali okungaqinisekile nokungazinzi komnotho jikelele.

Question:
Esikhathini xy-indiza, igrafu x ^ (log y) = y ^ log x kuyinto
A.i-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
B.ijika elivaliwe
C.i-ray ku-quadrant yokuqala evulekile
D.iphuzu elilodwa
GivenAnswer:
ukuze siqonde ukuthi igrafu ye-equation \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \) ime kanjani, singasebenzisa izindlela ezithile zokuhlaziya ukuze sithole ukuthi yini le equation emele.

okokuqala, ake sibheke ukuthi le equation ishintsha kanjani uma sisebenzisa izakhiwo ze-logarithm. sisebenzisa umthetho we-logarithm othi \( \log(a^b) = b \log a \), singabhala kabusha i-equation yethu kanje:

\[
\log(x^{\log y}) = \log(y^{\log x})
\]
\[
(\log y)(\log x) = (\log x)(\log y)
\]

lokhu kubonisa ukuthi le equation ihlale iyiqiniso ngoba izinhlangothi zombili zilingana ngokuphelele. kodwa-ke, lokhu akusiniki ulwazi oluningi mayelana nendawo yegrafu. ngakho-ke, ake sibheke ezinye izindlela zokuhlaziya.

uma sibheka amacala akhethekile, njengokuthi uma \(x = y\), khona-ke:

\[
x^{\log x} = x^{\log x}
\]

lokhu futhi kuyiqiniso ngaso sonke isikhathi. manje, ake sibheke ukuthi kwenzekani uma \(x\) no \(y\) bengalingani.

uma sibheka ukuthi \(x = 1\) noma \(y = 1\), khona-ke:

\[
1^{\log y} = y^{\log 1} = y^0 = 1
\]
\[
1^{\log x} = x^{\log 1} = x^0 = 1
\]

lokhu kubonisa ukuthi noma yikuphi lapho \(x = 1\) noma \(y = 1\), igrafu ihlangana nohlaka lwe-axis \(x = 1\) noma \(y = 1\).

ngakho-ke, uma sibheka konke lokhu, singabona ukuthi igrafu ye-equation \( x^{\log y} = y^{\log x} \) ihlanganisa zonke izibalo ezitholakala ku-quadrant yokuqala lapho \(x > 0\) no \(y > 0\), futhi ihlanganisa noma yikuphi ukulingana lapho \(x = y\). lokhu kusinikeza ukuthi igrafu iyona:

**c. i-ray ku-quadrant yokuqala evulekile**

lokhu kungenxa yokuthi igrafu ihlanganisa zonke izibalo lapho \(x = y\) ku-quadrant yokuqala, futhi lokhu kubonakala njenge-ray (umugqa) oqala ekuqaleni (0,0) uye phambili ku-quadrant yokuqala.

Question:
Ukuhamba ngesivinini sokuqala se-1.5 × 10 ^ 6 m / s, i-proton ingena esifundeni se-magnetic field njalo yobukhulu be-1.5 T. Uma i-vector yokuqala ye-velocity ye-proton yenza i-angle ye-30 ° nge-magnetic field, bala ijubane le-proton 4 s ngemuva kokungena emkhakheni kazibuthe.
A.5.0 × 10^6 m / s
B.7.5 × 10^6 m/s
C.1.5 × 10^6 m / s
D.3.0 × 10^6 m / s
GivenAnswer:
ukuze sixazulule le nkinga, kufanele siqale ngokubheka ukuthi umkhakha kazibuthe uzothinta kanjani i-proton. uma i-proton ingena emkhakheni kazibuthe, izothola amandla kazibuthe aqondile ku-velocity yayo kanye nomkhakha kazibuthe. lokhu kudala ukuthi i-proton ihambisane nomzila wehelical noma circular, kuye ngokuthi i-velocity yayo iqala kanjani uma iqhathaniswa nomkhakha kazibuthe.

### isinyathelo 1: bala i-velocity perpendicular ku-magnetic field
i-velocity yokuqala ye-proton yi- \( v_0 = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \) futhi i-angle phakathi kwe-velocity ne-magnetic field yi- \( \theta = 30^\circ \). i-component ye-velocity perpendicular ku-magnetic field, \( v_{\perp} \), ingabalwa ngokusebenzisa i-sine yale angle:
\[ v_{\perp} = v_0 \sin(\theta) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times \sin(30^\circ) = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \times 0.5 = 0.75 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} = 7.5 \times 10^5 \, \text{m/s} \]

### isinyathelo 2: bala i-radius ye-circular motion
i-radius \( r \) yomzila we-circular ungabalwa ngokusebenzisa ifomula:
\[ r = \frac{m v_{\perp}}{q b} \]
lapho \( m \) ingukukhanya kwe-proton, \( q \) i-charge ye-proton, futhi \( b \) ubukhulu bomkhakha kazibuthe. amanani ajwayelekile:
- \( m = 1.67 \times 10^{-27} \, \text{kg} \) (mass of a proton)
- \( q = 1.6 \times 10^{-19} \, \text{c} \) (charge of a proton)
- \( b = 1.5 \, \text{t} \)

\[ r = \frac{1.67 \times 10^{-27} \, \text{kg} \times 7.5 \times 10^5 \, \text{m/s}}{1.6 \times 10^{-19} \, \text{c} \times 1.5 \, \text{t}} \]
\[ r = \frac{1.2525 \times 10^{-21} \, \text{kg m/s}}{2.4 \times 10^{-19} \, \text{c t}} \approx 0.522 \, \text{m} \]

### isinyathelo 3: bala i-velocity ye-proton ngemuva kwesikhathi esithile
njengoba i-proton ihamba ngendlela ye-circular ngenxa yomkhakha kazibuthe, i-velocity yayo perpendicular ku-magnetic field izohlala ingaguquki ngobukhulu kodwa ishintshe isiqondiso. i-velocity ephelele ye-proton izohlala ingu- \( v_0 = 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \) ngoba amandla kazibuthe awenzi msebenzi (awashintshi ubukhulu be-velocity, kuphela isiqondiso).

### impendulo
ngakho-ke, ijubane le-proton ngemuva kwemizuzwana engu-4 lokhu lingena emkhakheni kazibuthe lihlala lingu- \( 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \).

impendulo efanele:
c. \( 1.5 \times 10^6 \, \text{m/s} \)

Question:
Yimaphi amasethi alandelayo wezintambo ze-bit AYIKWAZI ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile?
A.Zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five
B.Zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye
C.Zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros
D.Zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros
GivenAnswer:
ukuze sithole ukuthi yimaphi amasethi alandelayo wezintambo ze-bit angachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile, kufanele siqale ngokuqonda ukuthi yini inkulumo ejwayelekile (regular expression) nokuthi yini umkhawulo wayo.

inkulumo ejwayelekile iyindlela yokuchaza amasethi ezintambo zezinhlamvu ngokusebenzisa izimpawu ezithile ezijwayelekile. lezi zimpawu zingachaza izintambo ezilula kanye nezinkimbinkimbi, kodwa zinomkhawulo uma kuziwa ekuchazeni izimo ezithile ezihlobene nenani lezimpawu ezithile noma ukulandelana okuyinkimbinkimbi kwezimpawu.

ake sihlaziye amasethi anikeziwe:

a. zonke izintambo ze-bit ezinenani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five.
   - lesi sethi singachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. isibonelo, inkulumo ejwayelekile engachaza izintambo lapho inani le-zeros liyi-multiple of five ingaba yinto efana ne `(1*01*01*01*01*0)*`.

b. zonke izintambo ze-bit eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye.
   - lesi sethi singachazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile. isibonelo, inkulumo ejwayelekile engachaza izintambo eziqala nge-zero futhi ziphela ngenye ingaba yinto efana ne `0(0|1)*0`.

c. zonke izintambo kancane nge inombolo ngisho zeros.
   - lesi sethi asikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile ngoba sidinga ukubala inani le-zeros ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi liyalingana noma lingaphansi kwenani le-ones, okuyinto engenakwenziwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile.

d. zonke izintambo kancane nge ezingaphezu kuka zeros.
   - lesi sethi asikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile ngoba sidinga ukubala inani le-zeros ukuze siqinisekise ukuthi liyaphezulu kwenani le-ones, okuyinto engenakwenziwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile.

ngakho-ke, amasethi c no-d ayikwazi ukuchazwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile ngenxa yokuthi adinga ukubalwa kwezimpawu ezithile, okuyinto engenziwa ngenkulumo ejwayelekile.

Question:

kulesi simo, idolobha liyalela ukuthi wonke amanani ezindlu ezilinganisiwe enyuke ngo-$5,000. lokhu kusho ukuthi inani eliphakathi lezindlu lizonyuka, kodwa ukuphambuka okujwayelekile kuzohlala kungashintshiwe ngoba ukwanda kwe-$5,000 kuyisengezo esifanayo kuzo zonke izindlu, okusho ukuthi ukusabalala kwedatha (ukuhlakazeka) akushintshi.

ngakho-ke, ukuphambuka okujwayelekile okusha kwamanani alinganisiwe ezindlu kuzohlala kungu-$23,000.

Question:

Question:

Umsolwa uzichaze watshela amaphoyisa ukuthi asegumbini lakhe lokulala wabe esehlala esitezi sesibili sendawo yokuhlala. Umsolwa uchaze ukuthi le ndoda ibihlala esitezi sokuqala kanti izindawo ehlala kuzo zihlukene nezikammangalelwa. Noma kunjalo, umsolwa wabekwa eboshiwe wabekwa icala lokutholakala ne-cocaine. D.waphika, ngoba iwaranti yayiqinisekisiwe futhi ikhishwe ngesizathu esingenzeka.
GivenAnswer:
isiphakamiso sommangalelwa sokuthi kukhishelwe ngaphandle i-cocaine ukuze ingeniswe ebufakazini kufanele **c.waphika**, ngoba amaphoyisa ayekholelwa ngokunengqondo ukuthi ayesesha indawo yokuhlala yendoda ngesikhathi engena ezindaweni zokuhlala yommangalelwa.

Question:
Lo mgunyathi unomthetho wobugebengu olandelayo osebenzayo:"Umuntu akanacala lokuziphatha ngobugebengu uma ngesikhathi sokuziphatha okunjalo, ngenxa yesifo sengqondo noma ukukhubazeka, engenawo amandla amakhulu okubonga ububi bokuziphatha kwakhe, noma ukuhambisana nokuziphatha kwakhe nezidingo zomthetho. Ngesikhathi bedlala i-catch ngaphandle, ummangalelwa waphonsa ibhola phezu kwekhanda lomshana wakhe, lase ligingqika emgwaqweni. Ngemuva kobufakazi bokumangalelwa, ufakazi onguchwepheshe wafakaza ngokuzivikela ukuthi ukusabela kohlobo oluchazwe ngummangalelwa akuyona into engavamile lapho kwenzeka isehlakalo esishaqisayo ngempela. A.Ummangalelwa wayehlushwa ukuhlanya okwesikhashana.

ukuzivikela okungcono kakhulu kommangalelwa kulokhu kungaba ukukhetha u-c: ukwehluleka kommangalelwa ukwenza kwakungeyona into yokuzithandela.

Question:

Question:
Yimaphi amaphuzu alandelayo asekela impikiswano ye-unilateralism yaseMelika?
A.Benevolent hegemony
B.Ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism
C.amandla American
D.Konke okungenhla
GivenAnswer:
d. konke okungenhla

impikiswano ye-unilateralism yasemelika ingasekelwa yilezi zizathu ezilandelayo:

a. **benevolent hegemony**: lokhu kusho ukuthi i-united states ingasebenzisa amandla ayo ukwenza izinqumo ezizuzisa umhlaba wonke, ngokubheka ukuthi izinqumo zayo zihlose ukuthuthukisa izimo zomhlaba jikelele, njengokulwela ukuthula nokusabalalisa intando yeningi.

b. **ukungasebenzi kwe-multilateralism**: kungakhonjiswa ukuthi izinhlangano eziningi zomhlaba noma izivumelwano zomhlaba wonke zihluleka ukufeza izinhloso zazo ngenxa yokuntuleka kokuvumelana phakathi kwamazwe amaningi. lokhu kungaholela ekutheni i-united states ikhethe ukusebenza yodwa ukuze iqhubekele phambili ngokushesha nangempumelelo.

c. **amandla american**: amandla ezomnotho, ezempi, nobuchwepheshe bakamelika bavumela izwe ukuthi lithathe izinyathelo ezizimele ngaphandle kokuncika kakhulu kwezinye izizwe noma izinhlangano zomhlaba ukufeza izinhloso zalo zangaphandle.

lezi zizathu zihlanganisa ukusekela kwempikiswano yokuthi i-united states ingasebenza ngendlela ye-unilateral uma kudingeka, ngenhloso yokukhuthaza izintshisekelo zayo zikazwelonke kanye nokuthuthukisa izimo zomhlaba jikelele.

Question:
Ngokomongo wokuhlangana kwembulunga yonke, singalichaza kanjani kahle igama elithi 'intuthuko'?
A.Igama elithi intuthuko libhekisela esimweni somuntu lapho kunenkululeko yokwesaba nokuswela; kunezinsiza ezanele zokugcina ukuphila futhi lokhu kuphila kungaba khona esimweni esikhululekile ekusongeleni, noma ukusongelwa okubonakalayo, kokuphazamiseka okungazelelwe.
B.Ukuze kubhekwe njengoba kuthuthukile, isizwe kumele sifinyelele isimo esithile sezomnotho nezombusazwe ngaphakathi kohlelo lombuso womhlaba wonke; umgomo walokho okwakha isimo 'esithuthukile' ngaleyo ndlela uchazwa yilezo zidingo zokusebenzisana kulolu hlelo.

GivenAnswer:
ukuchaza igama elithi "intuthuko" kungahluka kuye ngokuthi umongo noma indlela yokubuka. kodwa-ke, uma sibheka umongo wokuhlangana kwembulunga yonke, singasebenzisa incazelo ebanzi nejulile engabamba izici eziningi zempilo yabantu nezomnotho. ngakho-ke, impendulo engcono kakhulu kulezi ezinikeziwe ingaba:

a. igama elithi intuthuko libhekisela esimweni somuntu lapho kunenkululeko yokwesaba nokuswela; kunezinsiza ezanele zokugcina ukuphila futhi lokhu kuphila kungaba khona esimweni esikhululekile ekusongeleni, noma ukusongelwa okubonakalayo, kokuphazamiseka okungazelelwe.

Question:
Isisebenzi senkampani enkulu yokukhiqiza sithola umsebenzi udangele, futhi silandela umsebenzi kuphela ngemali. Isisebenzi senza kancane, futhi asigqugquzelekile ngakho-ke sikhiqiza inani eliphakeme kakhulu noma ikhwalithi engcono. Ngokwe-F. Herzberg's two-factor theory, indlela engcono kakhulu ye-10 yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalo msebenzi kungaba
A.ukunikeza ukwenyuselwa imali kanye nenkokhelo yokukhuthaza umkhiqizo omkhulu
B.hlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza
C.ukwandisa amathuba okusebenzisana nomphakathi okunolwazi
D.ukuhlinzeka isisebenzi nge-tide yomsebenzi ethwele udumo olukhulu
GivenAnswer:
ngokwe-frederick herzberg's two-factor theory, izici ezimbili eziyinhloko zithinta ukuzikhuthaza kwabasebenzi: izici zokugqugquzela (motivators) nezici zokugcina (hygiene factors). izici zokugqugquzela zihlanganisa izinto ezifana nokuzuzwa, ukwamukelwa, umsebenzi ngokwawo, ukuthuthukiswa, kanye nesibopho. lezi zinto zisiza ekukhuliseni ukwaneliseka komsebenzi nokuzikhuthaza. izici zokugcina zihlanganisa izinto ezifana nomholo, izimo zokusebenza, ubudlelwano nabanye, kanye nezinqubomgomo zenhlangano, ezisiza ekuvikeleni ukunganeliseki kodwa azikhuthazi ukuzikhuthaza okuphezulu.

uma sibheka isimo esichazwe lapho isisebenzi sithola umsebenzi udangele futhi singagqugquzelekile, indlela engcono kakhulu yokwandisa ukuzikhuthaza kwalesi sisebenzi ngokusho kwe-herzberg's theory kungaba:

**b. hlela kabusha umsebenzi ukunikeza inselelo nomqondo wokufeza**

lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukuphinda uhlele umsebenzi ukuze unikeze inselelo enkulu kanye nomuzwa wokufeza kungashintsha indlela isisebenzi esibona ngayo umsebenzi waso, sikhuthaze ukuzibandakanya okukhulu, futhi sikhuphule ukwaneliseka komsebenzi. lokhu kungaholela ekukhiqizeni okuphezulu nasekusebenzeni kangcono, njengoba isisebenzi sizozizwa sinesibopho esikhulu futhi sibona ukubaluleka komsebenzi waso.

izinketho ezifana ne-a, c, no-d zingase zithuthukise izimo ezithile kodwa azigxili ngqo ekushintsheni indlela isisebenzi esibona ngayo umsebenzi waso noma ekunikezeni izizathu ezinamandla zokuzibandakanya ngokujulile nomsebenzi wansuku zonke, okuyizinto ezibalulekile ekukhuthazeni ngokwe-herzberg's theory.

Question:
Owesifazane oneminyaka engu-54 ubudala uza ehhovisi ngoba uye waba nobuhlungu bokudubula ngezikhathi ezithile phezu kwesidlele sakhe sokunene nomhlathi phakathi namasonto ama-3 edlule. Isiqephu ngasinye sobuhlungu sihlala i-1 yesibili noma ngaphansi. Ubuhlungu buvame ukuvuswa umoya obandayo, ukuhlafuna, ukuvuselela okuthintekayo, nokuxubha amazinyo akhe. Akazange abe nobuhlungu ebusweni noma ekhanda. Umlando wezokwelapha uyaphawuleka ngokungezwani kwekhanda, ukukhuluphala, nokuhlinzwa kwe-gastric bypass. Uneminyaka engu-165 cm (5 ft 5 in) ubude futhi unesisindo esingu-62 kg (137 lb); BMI kuyinto 23 kg / m2 . Izimpawu ezibalulekile zivamile. Isiguli asikwazi ukubekezelela ukuthinta ohlangothini lwesokudla lobuso. Akukho ubuthakathaka bobuso noma ukulahlekelwa umuzwa. Insali yokuhlolwa komzimba ayikhombisi ukungahambi kahle. I-CT scan yekhanda ngokungafani nangaphandle kwayo ayibonisi ukungahambi kahle. Yikuphi kulokhu okulandelayo okuyi-pharmacotherapy efanele kakhulu ngalesi sikhathi?
A.Carbamazepine
B.Lamotrigine
C.Levetiracetam
D.Topiramate
GivenAnswer:
isiguli esichazwe lapha sibonakala sinezimpawu ezijwayelekile ze-trigeminal neuralgia, okuyisimo esibuhlungu esihambisana nobuhlungu obukhulu, obudubulayo ebusweni, obuvame ukuvuswa yizinto ezifana nokuthinta, ukuxubha amazinyo, noma umoya obandayo. ubuhlungu buhlala isikhathi esifushane futhi buvame ukuba ohlangothini olulodwa lobuso kuphela.

i-carbamazepine iyisinqumo sokuqala sokwelapha i-trigeminal neuralgia futhi inomlando omude wokusebenza kahle ekunciphiseni noma ekususeni izimpawu zalesi simo. isebenza ngokuvimbela ama-sodium channels ezinzwa, okunciphisa ukudluliswa kwezimpawu zobuhlungu.

a. **carbamazepine** - lokhu kuyindlela efanele kakhulu yokwelapha i-trigeminal neuralgia futhi kufanele kube ukukhetha kokuqala kwe-pharmacotherapy kulesi simo.

b. lamotrigine - nayo ingasetshenziswa njengokwelashwa kwe-trigeminal neuralgia, ikakhulukazi uma i-carbamazepine ingasebenzi noma ingabekezeleleki, kodwa akuyona inketho yokuqala.

c. levetiracetam - isetshenziswa kakhulu ekwelapheni izinhlobo ezithile zezifo zokuthuthumela, kodwa ayivamile ukusetshenziswa ekwelapheni i-trigeminal neuralgia.

d. topiramate - nayo ingasetshenziswa njengokwelashwa kwe-trigeminal neuralgia kodwa njenge-carbamazepine noma i-lamotrigine, akuyona inketho yokuqala.

ngakho-ke, impendulo efanele kakhulu lapha yi-**a. carbamazepine**.

Question:
Yiziphi izitatimende ezilandelayo mayelana ne-glucose metabolism ezilungile?

A.I-Glucagon yandisa izinga le-glycolysis
B.I-Glycolysis idinga i-NADP +
C.Ku-glycolysis, i-glucose i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu
D.Umkhiqizo wokugcina we-glycolysis kumaseli abomvu egazi yi-pyruvate
GivenAnswer:
phakathi kwezitatimende ezinikeziwe, lezi ezilandelayo zilungile:

c. ku-glycolysis, i-glucose i-cleaved ibe yimikhiqizo emibili ye-carbon emithathu - lokhu kulungile. ngesikhathi se-glycolysis, i-glucose (eyi-carbon eyisithupha) ihlukaniswa ibe izinhlanganisela ezimbili ze-glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate, ngayinye enama-carbon amathathu.

d. umkhiqizo wokugcina we-glycolysis kumaseli abomvu egazi yi-pyruvate - lokhu kulungile. ngesikhathi se-glycolysis, i-glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate iguqulwa ibe yi-pyruvate, okuyiyona umkhiqizo wokugcina we-glycolysis kumaseli amaningi, kufaka phakathi amaseli abomvu egazi.

izitatimende a no-b azilungile ngoba:

a. i-glucagon yandisa izinga le-glycolysis - lokhu akulungile. i-glucagon empeleni yandisa izinga le-gluconeogenesis futhi inciphisa izinga le-glycolysis. i-glucagon ikhishwa uma izinga le-glucose egazini liphansi, futhi isebenza ukukhulisa izinga le-glucose egazini ngokukhuthaza ukukhiqizwa kwe-glucose emzimbeni.

b. i-glycolysis idinga i-nadp+ - lokhu akulungile. i-glycolysis idinga i-nad+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide), hhayi i-nadp+ (nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide phosphate). i-nad+ isebenza njengomamukeli we-electron ngesikhathi se-glycolysis, lapho iguqulwa ibe yi-nadh.

Question:
Inhloso yocwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili noma olunamaski amabili ku:

B.Nciphisa imiphumela yokuhlukahluka kwesampula

ngamafuphi, ucwaningo oluyimpumputhe kabili lusetshenziselwa ukuthuthukisa ukwethembeka nokunemba kwemiphumela yocwaningo ngokunciphisa noma ngokugwema ukukhetha kanye nezinye izinto ezingathonya imiphumela yocwaningo.

Question:

Question:
Ukusetshenziswa okukhulu kobisi

A.Kubikwa ukuthi kuhlotshaniswa nesigameko esiphezulu sokuqhekeka nokufa okuphezulu ezifundweni ezimbalwa
B.Ngesikhathi sokuvuthwa kubonakala sengathi kuhlotshaniswa nobuningi obuphezulu bamaminerali amathambo ekuphileni kwasekupheleni
C.Ihlotshaniswa njalo nezinga eliphansi lokuphuka
D.Emazweni anezinga eliphakeme kakhulu lokuphuka kubonisa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi kuzuzisa amathambo.
GivenAnswer:
ukusetshenziswa kobisi kungaba nezinzuzo ezahlukene kanye nemiphumela emibi, kuye ngokuthi kusetshenziswa kanjani futhi kubhekwa izici ezifana nempilo yomuntu ngamunye, iminyaka, kanye nendawo ahlala kuyo. nansi incazelo yezinketho ezinikeziwe:

a. **kubikwa ukuthi kuhlotshaniswa nesigameko esiphezulu sokuqhekeka nokufa okuphezulu ezifundweni ezimbalwa** - lokhu kungasho ukuthi ezinye izifundo zithole ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi okukhulu kungaholela ezinkingeni zezempilo ezifana nokwanda kokuphuka kwamathambo noma izinkinga zezempilo eziholela ekufeni. kodwa-ke, kubalulekile ukucabangela ukuthi lezi zifundo zingase zibe nemikhawulo futhi kudingeka ucwaningo olwengeziwe ukuqinisekisa le miphumela.

b. **ngesikhathi sokuvuthwa kubonakala sengathi kuhlotshaniswa nobuningi obuphezulu bamaminerali amathambo ekuphileni kwasekupheleni** - lokhu kungasho ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi ngesikhathi sokukhula kungasiza ekuthuthukiseni amathambo aqinile, okungase kusize ekugcineni amathambo aqinile ngisho nasekupheleni kwempilo. ubisi lucebile ngamaminerali afana ne-calcium ne-vitamin d, abalulekile ekwakheni nokugcina amathambo aqinile.

c. **ihlotshaniswa njalo nezinga eliphansi lokuphuka** - lokhu kungakhomba ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi kunganciphisa ingozi yokuphuka kwamathambo, mhlawumbe ngenxa yokuqukethwe kwe-calcium ne-vitamin d ekhuthaza amathambo aqinile.

d. **emazweni anezinga eliphakeme kakhulu lokuphuka kubonisa ukuthi ukusetshenziswa kobisi kuzuzisa amathambo** - lokhu kungase kube ukuphawula okubonisa ukuthi noma emazweni lapho ukuphuka kwamathambo kuvame kakhulu, ukusetshenziswa kobisi kungase kube nomthelela omuhle ekugcineni amathambo eqinile futhi kunciphise ingozi yokuphuka.

kubalulekile ukukhumbula ukuthi imiphumela yokusetshenziswa kobisi ingahluka kuye ngomuntu ngamunye, futhi kufanele kuhlale kucatshangelwa izeluleko zezempilo ezivela kochwepheshe bezokudla noma odokotela ngaphambi kokwenza izinguquko ezinkulu ekudleni.

Question:
Ucwaningo nge-etiology yaseSchizophrenia lwabonisa ukuthambekela kwezakhi zofuzo esimweni kodwa ezinye izinto ziyabandakanyeka. Ngokolwazi lwakho lwendaba hlonza ukuthi yiziphi kulezi zitatimende ezilandelayo ezingalungile.
A.I-dopamine eyengeziwe noma ukuzwela ku-dopamine kungaba yinto enegalelo.
B.Iziguli ezimhlophe ziyizimpawu eziningi.
C.Ukuxolelwa esimweni eZweni Lesithathu kungu-65%.
D.Izinga eliphansi le-Schizophrenia elitholakale phakathi kwabantu base-Afrika baseMelika.
GivenAnswer:
ucwaningo oluningi luye lwabonisa ukuthi i-schizophrenia iyisifo esinobunzima obuningi obuhlanganisa izici zofuzo, izinto zemvelo, kanye ne-neurochemical imbalances. ake sihlaziye izitatimende ezinikeziwe:

a. i-dopamine eyengeziwe noma ukuzwela ku-dopamine kungaba yinto enegalelo.
- lesi sitatimende silungile. ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi ukungalingani kwe-neurotransmitter i-dopamine kungadlala indima ekuthuthukiseni i-schizophrenia. lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi "i-dopamine hypothesis" ye-schizophrenia.

b. iziguli ezimhlophe ziyizimpawu eziningi.
- lesi sitatimende asilona iqiniso. i-schizophrenia ayikhethi uhlanga noma isizinda somuntu. itholakala emiphakathini ehlukene emhlabeni wonke ngaphandle kokukhetha uhlanga.

c. ukuxolelwa esimweni ezweni lesithathu kungu-65%.
- lesi sitatimende silungile. ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi amathuba okuthola ukuxolelwa (ukuthuthuka kwesimo) kwe-schizophrenia aphakeme kakhulu emazweni asathuthuka uma kuqhathaniswa namazwe athuthukile. lokhu kungahlobene nezindlela zokuphila, ukusekelwa komphakathi, kanye nezinye izici zemvelo.

d. izinga eliphansi le-schizophrenia elitholakale phakathi kwabantu base-afrika basemelika.
- lesi sitatimende asilona iqiniso. izinga le-schizophrenia alihlukile kakhulu phakathi kwabantu base-afrika basemelika uma kuqhathaniswa nabanye abantu e-united states. ucwaningo lukhombisa ukuthi izinga lokuvama kwe-schizophrenia lifana kakhulu emiphakathini ehlukene, yize kunezimpawu zokuthi ukunakekelwa kwezempilo kanye nokufinyelela ekwelashweni kungahluka.

ngakho-ke, izitatimende b no-d azilungile ngokusho kolwazi olutholakalayo mayelana ne-schizophrenia.
